mapper.insert: insert into TRNetGridEventDistribute (EventDistributeID, EventID, UserID, AcceptedUserID, StartTime, EndTime, Remark) values (#{eventDistributeID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{acceptedUserID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TRNetGridEventDistribute set EventID = #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AcceptedUserID = #{acceptedUserID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, StartTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EventDistributeID = #{eventDistributeID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT EventDistributeID,EventID,t2.UserName,t2.Dept,tt.UserName AcceptedUserName,tt.Dept AcceptedUserDept,StartTime,EndTime,Remark FROM TRNetGridEventDistribute t1 left join TEUser t2 on t1.UserID=t2.UserID left join(select t3.AcceptedUserID,t4.UserName,t4.Dept from TRNetGridEventDistribute t3 left join TEUser t4 on t3.AcceptedUserID=t4.UserID)tt on t1.AcceptedUserID=tt.AcceptedUserID WHERE EventID=#{id} group by EventDistributeID
select EventDistributeID, EventID, UserID, AcceptedUserID, StartTime, EndTime, Remark from TRNetGridEventDistribute
